name: bncms

stmt.origin: simp2bi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms))
stmt.pretty: simp2bi(c0 ∈ Ban, c0 ∈ CMetSp, c0 ∈ NrmVec, (Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccms))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cbn), w3a(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ban → c0 ∈ CMetSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ban ↔(c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧ c0 ∈ CMetSp ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp))

cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ban → c0 ∈ CMetSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ban ↔(c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧ c0 ∈ CMetSp ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cbn), w3a(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms)))
-| wceq(cfv(csca, c0), cfv(csca, c0))
body.pretty:

comment: A Banach space is a complete metric space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
